verses.text: The \sc Lord\sc* reigneth, he is clothed with majesty; The \sc Lord\sc* is clothed with strength, \add wherewith\add* he hath girded himself: The world also is stablished, \add that\add* it cannot be moved.
Thy throne is established of old: Thou \add art\add* from everlasting.
The floods have lifted up, O \sc Lord\sc*, The floods have lifted up their voice; The floods lift up their waves.
The \sc Lord\sc* on high \add is\add* mightier Than the noise of many waters, \add Yea, than\add* the mighty waves of the sea.
Thy testimonies are very sure: Holiness becometh thine house, O \sc Lord\sc*, for ever.
